itemDisplayName: Deploy Ubuntu VM with Open JDK 7 and 8 with Maven and Team Services Linux build agent
description: This template allows you to create a Ubuntu VM with OpenJDK and Visual Studio Team Services Linux build agent. Currently custom script file is pulled temporarily from https link on raw.githubusercontent.com/snallami/templates/master/ubuntu/java-tomcat-install.sh. Once the VM is successfully provisioned, Team Services build agent installation can be verified by looking under your Team Services account settings under Agent pools
summary: Deploy Ubuntu VM with Open JDK and Team Services Linux Build Agent
